item.title: Waymo resumes service in San Francisco after robotaxis stall during blackout
item.description: Waymo suspended its SF robotaxi service on Saturday evening after a massive blackout appeared to leave many of its vehicles stalled on city streets.

item.title: A rough week for hardware companies
item.description: iRobot, Luminar, and Rad Power Bikes were very different companies, but they faced some similar challenges.
